title: My Art Journey
script:
Anushka: Namaste dosto! Aaj main aap sabse apni kala yatra ke baare mein baat karna chahti hoon.

Anushka: Bachpan mein, mujhe rangon se khelna bahut pasand tha. Deewaron par, copy mein, har jagah!

Anushka: Maa daantti thi, par phir bhi, main chupke se kuch na kuch banaati rehti thi.

Anushka: Fir school mein drawing competition hua. Main darr rahi thi, par maine participate kiya.

Anushka: Aur main jeet gayi! Woh pal, meri zindagi ka turning point tha.

Anushka: Uske baad, maine kabhi peeche mudkar nahi dekha. Painting meri passion ban gayi.

Anushka: Ab main exhibition karti hoon, log meri art ko pasand karte hain. Ye sab ek chhoti si shuruwaat se hua.

Anushka: Kala sirf rang bharna nahi hai, dosto. Ye khud ko vyakt karne ka ek zariya hai.

Anushka: To, apne andar ke artist ko pehchano, aur usse duniya ko dikhao! Dhanyavaad!
